message.body: Your plant looks great! Is that a Tajik flag? Thanks for sending these!
The earliest I can get a check to you is 9/18 so see if you can use a credit card or do a partial payment until 9/18.
Can you write me a check and I can deposit it? I need to give them a check now, but they said I could ask them to postpone cashing it
Ok. I'll send it to you now.
No it's closed now until 7 am, but they are available
When should I tell them to Hil it for?
